Ecoinvent 2p0. Row 3471 - Data Set 3526 using ecoinvent 'EUR-flat pallet', RER. Unit weight is assumed to be 23 kg - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/EUR-pallet Difference with 48x42 is neglected. Wood harvesting impacts are included in this EF
SimaPro:(Industry data 2.0, HDPE pipes E) Assumed pallets used are made of HDPE plastic and production are similar to HDPE plastic pipes.

Ecoinvent 2p0 Row 2579  Dataset 1818 ethylene vinyl acetate copolymer, at plant (glue)  RER (European)  as proxy
B&J allocated From page 21, based on B&J's emissions per cow metric EF is 0.819.

SimaPro:(Ecoinvent, Disposal, municipal solid waste 22.9% water, to sanitary landfill/CH S)
"recycled content method": production  from a recycled material accounts for zero.
Ben & Jerry report p.20 - estimation by Dennis Totzke (B&J Waste water Eng)
Liquid waste from digesters are used as fertilizers, solid waste are used for bedding(Andrea Asch). If we use the "recycled content method" the part of recycled material doesn't account for emission.

Ben & Jerry report p.26 - estimation by Dennis Totzke (B&J Waste water Eng) accounting methane and nitrous oxide emissions.[ (GHG in ton per year X 2000 lb/ton X .453kg/lb) / total amount of pints produced at waterbury per year ]/ total weight of ingredients
SimaPro:(Ecoinvent, Disposal, municipal solid waste 22.9% water, to sanitary landfill/CH S)
Simapro: (Ecoinvent, Waste Incineration of municipal solid waste (MSW), EU-27)
